message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $70. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price point. I'd be willing to go up to $75, but I think that's the highest I can go. Can you meet me at $75?
